errors.error_description: Specified an outdated version of googletrans dependency that may cause installation or compatibility issues
correction_candidates: First, install the required dependencies by running `pip install googletrans`.
First, install the required dependencies by running `pip install googletrans>=4.0.0`.
First, install the required dependencies by running `pip install googletrans==4.0.0`.
First, install the required dependencies by running `pip install googletrans-py`.
errors.golden_answer: First, install the required dependencies by running `pip install googletrans>=4.0.0`.
